title: Spicy and Stimulating!
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>You-san, You-san, I actually have a secret plan for the Youkisoba we’re making today....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>A secret plan? Sounds interesting~! What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Why don’t we try adding some punchy spices? I want to express your energetic nature, which can easily do the hell triathlon in the Youkisoba.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahaha, thanks for the compliment! Then let’s give it a try!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Okay! I’ve prepared these few spices for now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>You’re going all out, huh~! What’s this? *Sniff sniff*.... Yeap, that’s one unique spice!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I’d like to put in some spicy and stimulating peppers, something that can give you a sort of spark in your brain!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Hmm.... I think this one and this one.... and also this one would work! Let’s try making it. Setsuna-chan, can you cut the vegetables?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ta-da! It’s done~! Let’s try it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yes, thanks for the food. *Munch*.... Hnn~, it’s delicious! It feels kind of Asian....? Oriental....? It’s spicy, but it has such a deep flavor....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Since you bought a ton of spices, it was a bunch of fun thinking about the seasonings. Let’s bring some for everyone~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
